title: CyberTip Triage — 90-Second Investigator Demo
description: A concise walkthrough of CyberTip Triage for ICAC task forces, demonstrating AI-powered prioritization, Wilson compliance automation, warrant workflows, and bundle deduplication.
target_audience: ICAC investigators and supervisors evaluating triage automation tools

cues.narration: Your task force receives thousands of NeCMEC tips a month. Most are reviewed manually, one at a time. CyberTip Triage changes that.
cues.caption: The tip volume problem

cues.narration: The dashboard gives you an immediate operational picture. Stats cards show total tips, pending reviews, and blocked files at a glance.
cues.caption: Real-time operational overview

cues.narration: Every incoming tip is scored by AI and assigned a priority tier — from Immediate down to Monitor. No more guessing what to work first.
Filter to Immediate tier to surface active victim situations and hands-on offenders right now.
cues.caption: Filtering critical tips

cues.narration: Select the top tip. The detail pane shows the AI's crisis assessment, subject identifiers, and the ESP's original report data.
Notice the cluster alert. The system detected fourteen duplicate tips linked to a single viral incident and collapsed them automatically.
cues.caption: Bundle deduplication

cues.narration: Now let's look at the files tab. This is where Wilson compliance matters most — and where risk lives.
cues.caption: Wilson v. United States compliance

cues.narration: Files the ESP never viewed are automatically blocked. You cannot open them without a warrant. The system enforces this — no exceptions, no accidental Fourth Amendment violations.
To access blocked files, initiate the warrant workflow directly from the tip. Click to mark the application as filed and track its status.
cues.caption: Integrated warrant tracking

cues.narration: When the warrant is granted, blocked files unlock automatically. Full chain of custody is logged for court.
Every tip includes circuit-specific legal guidance. The system identifies your jurisdiction and surfaces relevant case law and procedural requirements.
Supervisors get a separate admin view for workload balancing and compliance auditing across the task force.
cues.caption: Supervisor panel

cues.narration: On-call investigators access the same prioritized queue from a mobile interface — anytime, anywhere.
cues.caption: Mobile on-call access

cues.narration: CyberTip Triage. Faster prioritization. Built-in compliance. More children protected.
cues.caption: CyberTip Triage — Built for ICAC
